name: Street Pigeon
description:
---CONTROLS---

  • E R T  U I : QTE keys
  • C : Speak in street pigeon
  • Click to start at beginning or restart game at the end

90% of Sound FX are homemade xD !

---How to play---

Its a runner QTE game, people will come and you have to succeed the QTE keys to win respect and keep your street cred bar as full as possible.
Sometime a Grandma will show up and feed you with bread that will surely up your street cred ! 
Tips : Kids are speed, Muscled dude are hard to impressed

Tips : Try to do some perfect ;)

---Story---

As many may have noticed, the pigeons no longer fly away when you pass in front of them.

The goal is simple : You play this new kind of street pigeon that walk in the street, and you have to keep your street cred during the walk and imposed your respect on the citizens, It's them who must step aside not you !

---About the Jam---

Mini Jam 99

Theme : Birds

Limitation : Can't stop moving

Link : https://minijamofficial.com/editions/99
Special thanks to them !
